channel.title: 562 Update command Help!
channel.description:
Hi All
I Just got a question if i played other RSPS from other peoples i Si that they have a ::update command because if i played long time just a owner say we going to update our server 10sec later i Si this Systeem Update 10:00 Same like runescape.com and its a 562 i just think about how i can do it to i did ::update 100 nothing work i tried everything but nothing work someone know's how it might be working??
Thanks Ricardo
